alert.note: Alert for Anson; Stanly (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 4:27PM EDT until June 16 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Anson County in central North Carolina... Stanly County in central North Carolina... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 425 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Plyler, or near Albemarle, and is nearly stationary. A second severe thunderstorm was located northeast of Locust. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Albemarle, Plyler, Locust, Oakboro, Stanfield, Richfield, New London and Finger. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
